com.example.android

Class ManualSignInActivity.UserSignupTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.android.ManualSignInActivity.UserSignupTask
  • Enclosing class:
    ManualSignInActivity

    public class ManualSignInActivity.UserSignupTask
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an asynchronous login/registration task used to authenticate the user.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void enterApplication(java.lang.Boolean success)
      Transition to MainActivity.
      void executeUpdate(java.lang.String servResponse)
      Checks if the user has successfully signed up, and log them in via ManualSignInActivity.UserLoginTask.
      protected void onCancelled()
      Aborts if user cancels login.
      void signUser()
      Attempts a new user sign up, previously reading and validating user data via UserInfoValidator.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • enterApplication

        protected void enterApplication(java.lang.Boolean success)
        Transition to MainActivity.
        Parameters:
        success - True if login was successful, false otherwise

      • onCancelled

        protected void onCancelled()
        Aborts if user cancels login.

      • signUser

        public void signUser()
        Attempts a new user sign up, previously reading and validating user data via UserInfoValidator. This function initializes UserInfo if everything was OK and sends the request to app-server. Transition to MainActivity is made on executeUpdate method.

      • executeUpdate

        public void executeUpdate(java.lang.String servResponse)
        Checks if the user has successfully signed up, and log them in via ManualSignInActivity.UserLoginTask.
        Parameters:
        servResponse - The app-server's response to the sign up request
